content.rendered:
Your green building career starts here

Whether you are just starting out or a seasoned green building pro, CAGBC has courses and workshops to fit you career aspirations. Developed and delivered by industry professionals with Canadian project experience, CAGBC can help further your career and expand your green building knowledge. 

Follow your passion

If you care about climate change and sustainability, a career in green building could be the right fit. Green building offers you a chance to be part of large-scale climate action as the industry sets its sight on decarbonizing the built environment by 2050. 

Explore convenient, on-demand courses to learn at your pace. 

View the course list

New course bundles target an area of interest — like integrated design, zero carbon and more.

LEARN MORE

Not sure where to start? Try these introductory courses to launch your green building career.

LEARN MORE

LEED credentials take you far

As the gold standard in green building rating systems, LEED is a standout. Take your career to the next level with LEED professional credentials. Administered through the USGBC, LEED credential demonstrate your proficiency in today’s sustainable design, construction and operations standards. 

For those just starting out, the LEED Green Associate signifies your core competency in green building principles, and provides value on any green building project. CAGBC offers courses designed to help you prepare for the LEED GA exam. Learn more about our kickstarters. 

Green building professionals actively working on projects should look to LEED AP with specialty, an advanced professional credential signifying expertise in green building and a LEED rating system. 

For more information or to book an exam, visit USGBC. 

More educational programming awaits with CAGBC’s live events.

See what’s coming next

Take a course

Explore all CAGBC’s on-demand courses

Earn LEED credentials

A LEED credential demonstrates proficiency in sustainable design, construction and operations.
